column2: Through glorious conquest and magnificent diplomacy, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has finally reunited the Celts of Western Europe

The Celts were once a powerful and widespread culture, but they were pushed to the margins of Western Europe and have become hopelessly fractured. However, if a particularly dynamic leader was able to reunite the Celts, the resurgent Celtic Empire would become a force to be reckoned with...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §Y[This.Culture.GetName] culture§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §Ya different Celtic culture§!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least 20 provinces of §Yany Celtic culture§! in the §YWestern Europe§! region
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns every province of §YCeltic culture§! in the §YWestern Europe§! region
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns every province of §YCeltic culture§! in the §YWestern Europe§! region\n§YINFO:§! A list of missing provinces is provided in the tooltip for the "take decision" button.
No-one has ever created the §YCeltic Unity bloodline§!
§RNo valid bloodline can be created and it should be impossible to take this decision!§!\n(Check info below for more details.)
\n§YINFO:§! The characteristics of the bloodline depend on which §YCeltic cultures§! exist in [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm. Currently, there are:
\n§YINFO:§! The following provinces are required to form the bloodline (they have §YCeltic culture§! and are located in §YWestern Europe§!), but they are NOT owned by [This.GetTitledFirstName]:

column1: # Special building names - Castle (as per vanilla, these are the same as for tribal)
